events.message: I recently received my order but need to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
The issue was reviewed and classified as a refund request following the customer's description of dissatisfaction and desire to return the product.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Maria Gonzalez to manage the refund process and communicate with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to assist you with that process.
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the return? Also, let us know if the product is unopened or used.
The order number is 8743621. I ordered the wrong size and the package has already been opened, but I haven’t used the item yet.
Thank you for the details. We can accept the return despite the package being opened. Please send the item back within 14 days and we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds good, thank you. I will prepare the item for return shipping and keep you updated once it’s sent.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with at this time.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this support case now.
